about_the_game:
Welcome to the nightclub!

Welcome to the nightclub of a fast growing and crime-ridden city. You have the opportunity to create the best and most popular club in the whole city!

Manage!

Manage the staff, make sure the needs of the customers are met, keep an eye on the amount of goods in stock so there is always something to treat the customers and don't forget about cleaning the club. Pour drinks and serve them to customers, but try to do it as quickly as possible because customers won't wait long for you and will leave a bad review and leave. Who needs this? If you want something more interesting, you can make a special cocktail for your visitor and sell it at a crazy price, because it's your signature cocktail.

Decorate!

Decorate your club by buying jewelry and changing the inside decorations to give the place you bought a tidy sum of money for some spirits!

Make money!

Discover new ways to make money! You may want to take a little risk and get involved with the city gangs, then your wallet will be replenished, but on the condition that you fulfill all the demands of the bandits. Build a magic herb farm right in your club, take care of the plants, manage the prices of the goods and, of course, sell them. For those who are alien to the gangster life, there are also quite legal ways to earn money. Build halls for private dances, and customers with their greenery will come to you by the river, because everyone wants to get pleasure from the dancer you hire. Surely among all customers will find avid gamblers, for whom you can put slot machines, on which you can also set the appropriate price.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains alcohol use, drug use, gambling and drug dealing.

detailed_description:
Welcome to the nightclub!

Welcome to the nightclub of a fast growing and crime-ridden city. You have the opportunity to create the best and most popular club in the whole city!

Manage!

Manage the staff, make sure the needs of the customers are met, keep an eye on the amount of goods in stock so there is always something to treat the customers and don't forget about cleaning the club. Pour drinks and serve them to customers, but try to do it as quickly as possible because customers won't wait long for you and will leave a bad review and leave. Who needs this? If you want something more interesting, you can make a special cocktail for your visitor and sell it at a crazy price, because it's your signature cocktail.

Decorate!

Decorate your club by buying jewelry and changing the inside decorations to give the place you bought a tidy sum of money for some spirits!

Make money!

Discover new ways to make money! You may want to take a little risk and get involved with the city gangs, then your wallet will be replenished, but on the condition that you fulfill all the demands of the bandits. Build a magic herb farm right in your club, take care of the plants, manage the prices of the goods and, of course, sell them. For those who are alien to the gangster life, there are also quite legal ways to earn money. Build halls for private dances, and customers with their greenery will come to you by the river, because everyone wants to get pleasure from the dancer you hire. Surely among all customers will find avid gamblers, for whom you can put slot machines, on which you can also set the appropriate price.
name: Nightclub Manager Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core TM i5 750
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Conteúdo sexual
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Create your own nightclub! Serve drinks, hire staff, keep it clean, sell illegal goods, decorate your club and much more!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Russian, Italian
